Bash(then node -e "const fs = require\(''fs''\); const data = JSON.parse\(fs.readFileSync\(''./tests/e2e/results/batch-test-results.json''\)\); console.log\(''üéØ SYNAPSE PROGRESO:''\); console.log\(''‚ïê''.repeat\(60\)\); console.log\(''M√≥dulos completados:'', data.modules.length, ''/ 59''\); const passed = data.modules.filter\(m => m.status === ''PASSED''\).length; const failed = data.modules.filter\(m => m.status === ''FAILED''\).length; console.log\(''‚úÖ PASSED:'', passed, ''\('' + Math.round\(passed/data.modules.length*100\) + ''%\)''\); console.log\(''‚ùå FAILED:'', failed, ''\('' + Math.round\(failed/data.modules.length*100\) + ''%\)''\); console.log\(''''\); console.log\(''√öltimos 5 m√≥dulos:''\); data.modules.slice\(-5\).forEach\(\(m,i\) => console.log\(''  '' + \(data.modules.length-4+i\) + ''.'', m.moduleKey + '':'', m.status\)\); console.log\(''''\); const remaining = 59 - data.modules.length; console.log\(''‚è≥ Restantes:'', remaining, ''m√≥dulos''\); console.log\(''üìä Progress:'', Math.round\(data.modules.length/59*100\) + ''%''\); console.log\(''‚ïê''.repeat\(60\)\);")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Aedr15150302" "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/16/bin/psql.exe" -h localhost -U postgres -d attendance_system -c "
-- Marcar dashboard como m√≥dulo de sistema \(no comercial, no tarjeta\)
UPDATE system_modules
SET module_type = ''system'',
    metadata = jsonb_set\(
      COALESCE\(metadata, ''{}''::jsonb\),
      ''{isFramework}'',
      ''true''
    \)
WHERE module_key = ''dashboard'';

-- Verificar
SELECT module_key, module_type, name FROM system_modules WHERE module_key = ''dashboard'';
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Aedr15150302" "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/16/bin/psql.exe" -h localhost -U postgres -d attendance_system -c "
-- Contar cu√°ntos m√≥dulos aparecer√≠an en panel-empresa actualmente
SELECT COUNT\(*\) as total_visible
FROM system_modules
WHERE is_active = true
  AND \(module_type IS NULL OR module_type NOT IN \(''submodule'', ''container''\)\)
  AND available_in IN \(''empresa'', ''company'', ''both''\)
  AND \(metadata->>''hideFromDashboard'' IS NULL OR metadata->>''hideFromDashboard'' != ''true''\);
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Aedr15150302" "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/16/bin/psql.exe" -h localhost -U postgres -d attendance_system -c "
SELECT module_key, module_type, available_in, metadata->>''hideFromDashboard'' as hidden
FROM system_modules
WHERE module_key IN \(''partners'', ''vendors'', ''auditor'', ''predictive-workforce-dashboard''\)
ORDER BY module_key;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Aedr15150302" "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/16/bin/psql.exe" -h localhost -U postgres -d attendance_system -c "

SET metadata = COALESCE\(metadata, ''{}''::jsonb\) || ''{""hideFromDashboard"": true}''::jsonb,
    available_in = ''admin''
WHERE module_key IN \(''partners'', ''vendors'', ''auditor'', ''predictive-workforce-dashboard''\);
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Aedr15150302" "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/16/bin/psql.exe" -h localhost -U postgres -d attendance_system -c "
SELECT module_key, module_type, available_in, metadata->>''hideFromDashboard'' as hidden
FROM system_modules
WHERE module_type IN \(''submodule'', ''container''\)
   OR available_in IN \(''none'', ''admin''\)
   OR metadata->>''hideFromDashboard'' = ''true''
ORDER BY module_key;
")
